body:
On Nov 8, 2018 9:25 PM, "David A. Harding" <notifications@github.com<mailto:notifications@github.com>> wrote:


This documents changes listed by git log v0.17.0...11e1ac3 --merges and integrates the existing detached release notes into the main file.
My goal is to update the release notes each month in order to reduce the amount of writing and review that needs to be done all at once near the start of the RC cycle.
Note: I've chosen to use fully-qualified URLs for linking to documentation, rather than shorter relative URLs that would otherwise be preferred, as the release notes are commonly copied into emails, reddit threads, and blog posts where relative URLs would be incomplete or would point to the wrong page.

You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:

  https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14688

Commit Summary


  *   Release notes: update notes through to 11e1ac3ae08
  *   Release notes: integrate detached release notes

File Changes


  *   D doc/release-notes-13152.md<http://release-notes-13152.md> (5)
  *   D doc/release-notes-14023.md<http://release-notes-14023.md> (8)
  *   D doc/release-notes-14282.md<http://release-notes-14282.md> (9)
  *   D doc/release-notes-14296.md<http://release-notes-14296.md> (5)
  *   D doc/release-notes-14454.md<http://release-notes-14454.md> (6)
  *   D doc/release-notes-14468.md<http://release-notes-14468.md> (15)
  *   M doc/release-notes.md<http://release-notes.md> (139)

Patch Links:


  *   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14688.patch
  *   https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14688.diff
